com.okta.sdk.schema

Interface Field

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Deletable, Resource, Saveable

    public interface Field
extends Resource, Saveable, Deletable
    A Field represents the configuration of an editable Resource field, it determines if its required or not.
    Since:
    0.5.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getName()
      Returns the name of the field
      Schema getSchema()
      Returns the schema this field belongs to.
      boolean isRequired()
      Returns true if the given field is required or false otherwise
      Field setRequired(boolean required)
      Sets the field as required or not

      • Methods inherited from interface com.okta.sdk.resource.Resource

        getResourceHref, setResourceHref

      • Methods inherited from interface com.okta.sdk.resource.Saveable

        save

      • Methods inherited from interface com.okta.sdk.resource.Deletable

        delete

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of the field
        Returns:
        the field's name

      • isRequired

        boolean isRequired()
        Returns true if the given field is required or false otherwise
        Returns:
        the field's required value

      • setRequired

        Field setRequired(boolean required)
        Sets the field as required or not

        After calling this method, you must call Saveable.save() to propagate the change to the Okta servers.

        Parameters:
        required - true if the field is required, false otherwise
        Returns:
        the Field itself

      • getSchema

        Schema getSchema()
        Returns the schema this field belongs to.
        Returns:
        the parent Schema
